aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro4: with over 3 years of experience, development while providing comprehensive technological solutions.
aboutMe.stack4: on the backend, with experience working in agile teams and end-to-end projects.
aboutMe.learning: I am passionate about continuous learning and technological innovation. I am persistent, curious, and enjoy taking on challenges that help me grow every day. I may not know everything, but I can assure you that I will research, ask, and learn until I do.
aboutMe.motto: I believe that interest and persistence are the key to learning anything.
aboutMe.teamwork: I enjoy working in teams, sharing knowledge, and building scalable solutions that deliver real value to users. I am convinced that in a team, everyone learns: both the one who receives help and the one who provides it.
aboutMe.personal: Outside of programming, I am passionate about social life, spending time with friends and family. I also enjoy traveling as a way to disconnect.
